doc:
Albert Dupontel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_Dupontel 0 Albert Dupontel (born 11 January 1964) is a French actor, film director and screenwriter. He started his career as a stand-up comedian. In February 1998, his film Bernie took the Grand Prize at the 9th Yubari International Fantastic Film Festival which was attended by Dupontel. Albert_Dupontel ( born 11_January_1964 ) is a_French_actor , film_director_and_screenwriter . He started his_career as a_stand-up_comedian . In February_1998 , his_film_Bernie took the_Grand_Prize at the_9th_Yubari_International_Fantastic_Film_Festival which was_attended by Dupontel .
